name: includable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
allowed or able to be included as part of a total or group: These payments are tax deductible to the payer and includable in the payee's taxable income. Because of size constraints, the number of entries includable in paper dictionaries is limited. Compare
countableRelated word
include
More examplesFewer examplesThe entire value of the home was includable in the decedent's gross estate.There were some studies where full papers were unavailable that could have been includable in the systematic review.Make a note of any appliances not includable as fixtures.
